scripts.package-chrome: json  -I -f src/manifest.json -e 'this.manifest_version = 3; this.background = { service_worker: "background.js" }; delete this.browser_specific_settings' ;  zip-build src -o -t %NAME%-v%VERSION%.%EXT%
scripts.package-firefox: json -I -f src/manifest.json -e 'this.manifest_version = 2; this.background = { scripts: [ "background.js" ] }; this.browser_specific_settings = { gecko: { id: "extension@e-id.github.io" } }' ; zip-build src -o -t %NAME%-firefox-v%VERSION%.%EXT%
